heading: 2.3 Disincentives to sharing data
text: lack rewardseffort prepare archivelack expertiseconcern value extracted othersconcern misinterpretationintellectual property issueswasted effort archive likely wouldn’t used

heading: 2.4 Funding open data
text:
Challenges fund open data, eg. governments, since data can’t source income. Complications:
1. Third party contracts manage host data = likely charging data users pay contributions
2. Third party resellers lobbying gov restrict data, since normally sell 
3. Data sales normally fund gov services
4. New systems required make data open suitable public (eg. annonymized /aggregated). Non-trivial challenging justify spending required.

heading: 5.1 Short term vs long term studies
text:
Longer term higher value, higher impact
Compared short term “don’t get funding can simply delay project pick later”, “lead 1-2 publications”Longer term studies = decades building infrastructure
